author: bsunanda
body: Some of the changes in the parameter values for HcalIsolatedTrackReco were missed out for 8_1_X (OK in 8_0_X). Also the default description in the trigger were made to match with what is in the HLT menu.
title: bsunanda:Run2-alca47 Missed out changes in the parameter values for the IsoTrack producers (done correctly for 8_0_X version)
